text: Děčín (, 1942–1945 Tetschen-Bodenbach, 1945 Děčín-Podmokly) is a city in the Ústí nad Labem Region of the Czech Republic. It is the capital of the Děčín District. The city is on the river Elbe and is near the border with Germany. It has about 48,000 inhabitants. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:Ústí nad Labem Region
title: Děčín
